name: TRELLIX ENDPOINT ENS [EXCLUSION ADDED]
description: This rule looks for exclusions added to Trellix Endpoint Security (formerly known as McAfee ENS). This could be malware trying to circumvent security scans of the system.
tags: Trellix,exclusions,endpoint,Defense Evasion,Impair Defenses,T1562,Disable or Modify Tools,T1562.001,md-info
query: (class:mcafee* (product:`mcafee endpoint security` OR application:`mcafee endpoint security`) eventid=[`1029`,`2005`,`2015`]) OR (metaclass:windows eventid=12 source:`mcafee endpoint security` rawmsg:`\Exclusion`) NOT srcipv4:$exclusions.global.srcipv4

name: TRELLIX ENDPOINT ENS [Exploit Prevention - <%= malwarename %>]
description: This rule looks for Exploit Prevention signature detection events generated by Trellix Endpoint Security (formerly known as McAfee ENS) appliances.
query: class=mcafee_epo product:[`trellix endpoint security`,`mcafee endpoint security`] method=`exploit prevention` NOT srcipv4:$exclusions.global.srcipv4

name: TRELLIX ENDPOINT ENS [AMSI - <%= malwarename %>]
description: This rule looks for AMSI detection events generated by Trellix Endpoint Security (formerly known as McAfee ENS) appliances.
query: class=mcafee_epo product:[`trellix endpoint security`,`mcafee endpoint security`] method=amsi NOT srcipv4:$exclusions.global.srcipv4

name: TRELLIX ENDPOINT ENS [OAS - <%= malwarename %>]
description: This rule looks for On Access Scan (OAS) detection events generated by Trellix Endpoint Security (formerly known as McAfee ENS) appliances.
query: class=mcafee_epo product:[`trellix endpoint security`,`mcafee endpoint security`] method:[`on-access scan`,`oas`] NOT category:`ops*` NOT srcipv4:$exclusions.global.srcipv4

name: TRELLIX ENDPOINT ENS [ODS - <%= malwarename %>]
description: This rule looks for On-Demand Scan (OdS) detection events generated by Trellix Endpoint Security (formerly known as McAfee ENS) appliances.
query: class=mcafee_epo product:[`trellix endpoint security`,`mcafee endpoint security`] method:[`on-demand scan`,`ods`] NOT category:`ops*` NOT srcipv4:$exclusions.global.srcipv4

name: TRELLIX ENDPOINT ENS [Access Protection - <%= malwarename %>]
description: This rule looks for threat detection events generated by the Access Protection module of Trellix Endpoint Security (formerly known as McAfee ENS) appliances.
query: class=mcafee_epo product:[`trellix endpoint security`,`mcafee endpoint security`] method:`access protection` NOT srcipv4:$exclusions.global.srcipv4

name: TRELLIX ENDPOINT ENS [ATP - <%= malwarename %>]
description: This rule looks for threat detection events generated by the Adaptive Threat Protection module of Trellix Endpoint Security (formerly known as McAfee ENS) appliances.
query: class=mcafee_epo product:[`trellix endpoint security`,`mcafee endpoint security`] method=`on-execute scan` NOT srcipv4:$exclusions.global.srcipv4

name: TRELLIX ENDPOINT ENS [DAC]
description: This rule looks for Dynamic Application Containment events generated by the Adaptive Threat Protection module of Trellix Endpoint Security (formerly known as McAfee ENS) appliances.
query: class:mcafee_epo product:[`trellix endpoint security`,`mcafee endpoint security`] method:`dynamic application containment` NOT srcipv4:$exclusions.global.srcipv4

name: TRELLIX ENDPOINT ENS [Real Protect - <%= malwarename %>]
description: This rule looks for Real Protect threat detection events generated by the Adaptive Threat Protection module of Trellix Endpoint Security (formerly known as McAfee ENS) appliances.
query: class=mcafee_epo product:[`trellix endpoint security`,`mcafee endpoint security`] method:[`real protect client`,`real protect cloud`] NOT srcipv4:$exclusions.global.srcipv4

name: TRELLIX ENDPOINT ENS [Self Protect - <%= malwarename %>]
description: This rule looks for threat detection events generated by the Self-Protection module of Trellix Endpoint Security (formerly known as McAfee ENS) appliances.
query: class=mcafee_epo product:[`trellix endpoint security`,`mcafee endpoint security`] method:`self protection` NOT srcipv4:$exclusions.global.srcipv4

name: TRELLIX ENDPOINT ENS [Web Protect]
description: This rule looks for threat detection events generated by the Web Protect module of Trellix Endpoint Security (formerly known as McAfee ENS) appliances.
query: class=mcafee_epo product:[`trellix endpoint security`,`mcafee endpoint security`] method:[`download url`,`url navigation`] action:`blocked` NOT srcipv4:$exclusions.global.srcipv4
